2018 Arizona North Regional Scouting Alliance

Welcome to our 2018 scouting alliance for the Arizona North Regional! If you are not yet a member, please contact us or click the links below to learn more and signup.

Information

Click here for details about the alliance

Click here to sign up

Click here for the Chief Delphi thread

Collect Data

Data collection is done through a Google Form. This form can be viewed on most devices with a modern web browser. Please click the button to see the form. Collect data (password protected)

View Data

Data is viewed through Google Sheets. Documentation can be found here. You must make a copy of the sheet and get a TBA API key. Make a copy/view data (password protected)

Click here to see the schedule

Event Support

During the event day, please find the supervisor on duty (see schedule). After hours, contact Jared Hasen-Klein.
Email jhasenklein@gmail.com
Call (818) 439 - 2892
Text (818) 439 - 2892
FB Messenger jhasenklein
